did.abstract: Collection contains letters from Confederate soldiers addressed to Mary Davison, mostly from the 28th Regiment of N.C. Infantry, describing army life, camp, and illnesses; a battle at Cape Hatteras, 1861; the shooting of an African-American who was allegedly trying to burn a bridge; descriptions of Fort Fisher and Wilmington.

scopecontent.head: Collection Overview
scopecontent.p: Collection contains letters from Confederate soldiers addressed to Mary Davison, mostly from the 28th Regiment of N.C. Infantry, describing army life, camp, and illnesses; a battle at Cape Hatteras, 1861; the shooting of an African-American who was allegedly trying to burn a bridge; descriptions of Fort Fisher and Wilmington.

odd.p: Cataloged from card file; description dating from 1934, 1957.
